title: Still pictures on television
creator_credit: Centre for Educational Television Overseas and Lawrie Lawler
brief_description: Demonstrates techniques of using still photographs and art work in television production, showing occasions where they are effective. Includes series of photographs and drawings to compress time and concludes with an example.
